creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
Tomcat gives me this error on windows:

228809 2003-02-19 21:04:39,067 [Thread-38] ERROR org.wyona.net.ProxyManager  -
 .
readConfig(/home/michi/src/wyona-cms/src/java/org/wyona/net/proxyconf.xml): 
java.io.FileNotFoundException: /home/michi/src/wyona-
cms/src/java/org/wyona/net/proxyconf.xml

174981 2003-02-19 21:03:45,239 [Thread-27] ERROR org.wyona.xml.Configuration  -
No such property: org.wyona.xps.XLinkInterpreter.cacheFolder

174981 2003-02-19 21:03:45,239 [Thread-27] ERROR org.wyona.net.Configuration  -
Could not find resource on classpath: org/wyona/net/conf.properties


------- Additional Comments From Gregor J. Rothfuss 2003-04-08 17:27 -------

*** Bug 70 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***


------- Additional Comments From Gregor J. Rothfuss 2003-04-08 17:28 -------

from 70:

these files do have hardcoded paths in them. we need to find
a crossplattform solution for these.

lenya/wyonacms/src/java/org/wyona/cms/cocoon/sitemap - clonePublication.sh
lenya/wyonacms/src/java/org/wyona/cms/rc - conf.properties (2 matches)
lenya/wyonacms/src/java/org/wyona/net - conf.properties
lenya/wyonacms/src/java/org/wyona/xml - xpsconf.properties (19 matches)
lenya/wyonacms/src/webapp/wyona/cms/bin - copy-recursive.sh (2 matches)

lenya/wyonacms/src/webapp/wyona/cms/bin - jtidy.sh
lenya/wyonacms/src/webapp/wyona/cms/bin - properties.conf (18 matches)
lenya/wyonacms/src/webapp/wyona/cms/bin - replicate.sh (3 matches)

jobs.xml

(2 matches)

ive - fo-main.xsl (3 matches)

slideset2fo.xsl (2 matches)

matches)

/lucene/index - _t.fdt (2 matches)
the old XPS code has to go
